definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: It's my honor to make prelude for the collected essays.
sentences.chinese: 如今能为这本散文集作序，我觉得很荣幸。

sentences.english: Recall Ancient Literature is a collection of poetry by Fang Chengxun, who is from Huizhou in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《复初集》是明代徽州人方承训的诗文集。

sentences.english: You want me to write an introduction to your lectures?
sentences.chinese: 你要我写一篇文章介绍你的讲座文集？

sentences.english: It is an anthology that crackles with wit and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本妙语连珠篇篇充满智慧的文集。

sentences.english: The author yields five lost works from poems collection in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 笔者从清人诗文集中辑得佚文五篇。

sentences.english: Byron's consumed memoirs possessed the merit of being well and entertainingly written.
sentences.chinese: 拜伦烧掉的文集集中了他写的好文章的精华。

sentences.english: The Proceedings of ICCSE 2008(with CD) have been published by Xiamen University Press officially.
sentences.chinese: 论文集与论文CD已经交由厦门大学出版社正式出版。

sentences.english: I find it a great honor to write a preface to this collection of his essays.
sentences.chinese: 能为他的这本散文集子作序，我觉得很荣幸。

sentences.english: They selected and compiled an anthology of essays according to criticisms on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们根据网路的评论，选编了一部散文集。

sentences.english: Almost three hundred years has past, but we only have one revised edition of Si Fu tang anthology.
sentences.chinese: 《文集》从初刊至今已近三百年，却仅有一个校点本。

sentences.english: She published prose anthology "Drifting Family", etc.
sentences.chinese: 著有散文集《漂泊的家庭》等。

sentences.english: It is my pleasure to prefaced for the essay.
sentences.chinese: 如今能为这本散文集作序，我觉得很荣幸。

sentences.english: I reviewed your collection of essays for my college newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在学校报纸上评论过你的散文集。

sentences.english: Using the corpus as input, you can create and test the KB.
sentences.chinese: 以文集作为输入，可以创建和测试知识库。

sentences.english: The estimate appears in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 这一估计值被刊登在国家科学院论文集上。

sentences.english: This first volume of the Arabic corpus was co-edited by Wilferd Madelung in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年，阿拉伯文集的第一册由马德伦共同编辑。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
to send (a manuscript) to the press
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
